1.description: URL that delivers a malware payload

2.description: Domain name that delivers a malware payload

3.description: ip:port combination that delivery a malware payload

4.description: URL that is used for botnet Command&control (C&C)

5.description: Domain that is used for botnet Command&control (C&C)

6.description: ip:port combination that is used for botnet Command&control (C&C)

7.description: Sender email address (envelope from) that is used for payload delivery

8.description: Sender email address (body from) that is used for payload delivery

9.description: MD5 hash of a malware sample (payload)

10.description: SHA256 hash of a malware sample (payload)

11.description: SHA3-384 hash of a malware sample (payload)

12.description: SHA1 hash of a malware sample (payload)

13.description: Domain used for credit card skimming (usually related to Magecart attacks)
